mapper.insert: insert into memberinfo ( id, password, nameKana, name, address, addrHurikana, tel, email, alarm, grade, first, memberStatus ) values ( #{id}, #{password}, #{nameKana}, #{name}, #{address}, #{addrHurikana}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{alarm}, #{grade}, #{first}, #{memberStatus} )
mapper.select: select * from memberinfo where id = #{id} and password = #{password} and memberstatus='join'
